sentences.english: The two versions dealing with the verse part in the novel should take the credit.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個全譯本對律詩部分的處理可說是可圈可點。

sentences.english: Film director , scriptwriter and so have many of the worth noting .
sentences.chinese: 電影在導演，編劇等都有着許多可圈可點之處。

sentences.english: Anhua dark tea has a rich culture background in the long tea history.
sentences.chinese: 安化黑茶文化底蘊深厚，千年茶史可圈可點。

definition: to be nothing to write home about (idiom)
(Tw) to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
lit. new bud/fig. new and original
